label: Tolerance
comment: Permissible limit or limits of variation that is fixed for the case in question but may be different in other cases.

datatypeProperties.comment: The margin numeric value of this specified tolerance.
The margin percentage value of this specified tolerance.
The minus percentage value of this specified tolerance.
The minus quantity value of this specified tolerance.
The surplus percentage value of this specified tolerance.
The surplus quantity value of this specified tolerance.

referencedBy.comment: An applicable operational tolerance of this specified fault.
A tolerance specified for a value of this metric characteristic.
